description:
Short canyon, definitely worth it as an addition to one of the nearby canyons.

Approach

Go up to the Pantenbrugg, and walk towards Hintersand. About 100m after passing by the Walenbach, a path leads up to the start of the canyon.

Descent

Some rappels are made on natural anchors (trees), the bigger ones have got single anchors.

Exit

Same as on your way up, unless you want to combine it with Linthschlucht.

Red tape

Beta sites

Further description in the following book : https://www.canyoning-equipment.com/produkt/swiss-alps-canyoning-vol-2-0/ https://www.descente-canyon.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=22224

Trip reports and media

Picture credits: Matthias Holzinger

Background
name: Walenbach
